home.title: Building digital experiences with code and creativity
home.description: I craft robust and scalable web applications using modern technologies. Specializing in React.js for frontend, Node.js and Python for backend development and React Native for mobile development.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
whatIDo.subtitle: I specialize in building modern web and mobile applications with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Creating responsive and interactive user interfaces using React.js, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks (Tailwind CSS, Styled Components).

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Building robust APIs and server-side applications using Node.js, Express, and various database technologies.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Developing mobile applications using React Native, Expo, and various mobile technologies.

cloud.title: Cloud Services
cloud.description: Deploying and managing cloud services using AWS, Azure, and Digital Ocean.

planning.title: Planning & Research
planning.description: Understanding requirements, researching solutions, and planning architecture.

development.title: Development
development.description: Writing clean, maintainable code with a focus on performance and best practices.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate fullstack developer with a love for creating innovative web solutions and mobile applications.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description1: Full Stack Developer with a strong track record delivering scalable, high-quality web applications using TypeScript and Python. Experienced in both frontend (React, Next.js, Tailwind),backend (Node.js, Python, NestJS, Express, FastAPI, PostgreSQL) and mobile (React Native, Expo) having contributed to over 15 real-world projects across various industries.
journey.description2: Skilled in building responsive UIs, robust APIs, and efficient integrations — always guided by clean code principles, testing (Jest, Cypress), and agile delivery. Cloud-ready mindset with experience deploying and maintaining applications in AWS, Azure, and DigitalOcean.
journey.description3: Integrated generative AI capabilities through the OpenAI API to enhance application features and streamline development workflows.
journey.description4: Development of solutions using generative AI, such as: agents, chatbots, RAG, data extraction and data treatment, among other solutions, using Python with LangChain, LangGraph, LLMs, OpenAI API.

pl.title: Fullstack Developer PL
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining web applications using ReactJS, NestJS, and TypeScript, contributing across both frontend and backend.
Responsible for building and deploying scalable solutions in cloud environments (AWS, DigitalOcean, Azure).
Integrated the OpenAI API into platform features, enabling intelligent interactions and automation capabilities.
Collaborating in agile sprints with cross-functional teams, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality features.
Improving application performance and maintainability through continuous refactoring, documentation, and testing practices.

lead.title: Fullstack Developer and Software Development Lead
responsibilities: Combined software development duties with the technical leadership of a 4-person engineering team, managing sprints, priorities, and successful project deliveries.
Contributed broadly to front-end and back-end development using ReactJS, NestJS, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL, handling a wide range of features, refactors, and integrations.
Collaborated closely with stakeholders to align technical execution with business goals, using agile methodologies and tools like Git and ClickUp.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable full-stack applications using ReactJS, NestJS, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL.
Led integrations with third-party APIs, increasing data reliability and consistency by 30%.
Refactored and optimized legacy codebases, improving application performance and reducing technical debt by 45%.
Actively participated in agile sprints and team collaboration using Git and ClickUp.

freelancer.title: Frontend Developer (Freelancer)
responsibilities: Developed modern, high-performance interfaces for landing pages, websites, and web systems, focusing on responsiveness and user experience.
Worked across the full stack using ReactJS (frontend) and Node.js (backend), including API integrations, state management, and performance optimization.
Managed the entire development lifecycle — from architecture and implementation to testing and delivery.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to discuss opportunities? I'd love to hear from you!

connect.title: Let's Connect
connect.description: Follow me on social media or check out my work on GitHub. I'm always open to new connections and opportunities.

services.question: What services do you offer?
services.answer: I specialize in full-stack web development, including frontend development with React.js, backend development with Node.js, database design, and API development.

process.question: What is your typical project process?
process.answer: My process typically includes requirements gathering, planning, design, development, testing, and deployment. I maintain clear communication throughout the project lifecycle.

freelance.question: Are you available for freelance work?
freelance.answer: Yes, I'm available for freelance projects. I can work on both short-term and long-term engagements, depending on the project requirements and timeline.

pricing.question: How do you handle project pricing?
pricing.answer: Project pricing depends on the scope, complexity, and timeline. I offer both fixed-price and hourly rate options. Contact me with your project details for a custom quote.
